entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0055 triggered on no space after spread operator #71219
  • C# formatting rules should have a "do not enforce" option #71218
  • Use ToList for collection-exprs of a single spread #71217
  • Consider preferring AddRange over CopyTo for collection-expressions of List type #71216
  • Attribute to hide members in IntelliSense in same project or solution #71210
  • EditorBrowsable(Never) Not Hiding Members in Release DLL #71209
  • Compiler should provide good error message for alias qualified name in string interpolation #71203
  • Request for Clarification: What is the behavior of relative paths for the purposes of a #line directive? #71202
  • Warn about possibly unintended behavior in `x is not A or B` pattern matching expressions #71204

Closed

  • IDE0290 refactoring doesn't work in presense of `GeneratedRegex` #71149
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34411.88 #71211
  • EditorConfig Naming rule does not respect required_modifiers anymore #53539
    Backlog
  • The .NET SDK has newer analyzers with version '7.0.4' than what version '7.0.3' of 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers' package provides. Update or remove this package reference. #69436
    18.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix BuildHost in Source Build #71215
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: method type re-inference #71214
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Enable skipped tests (rename and extract methods) #71213
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Don't copy test results to helix upload root. #71212
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expose programmatic suppressions from SuppressionInfo #71207
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove TS impl of goto-def. The are entirely on LSP now #71123
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure both parts of partial methods are analyzed when requesting analyzer diagnostics for a single file #71201
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unnecessary check of trailing trivia for directives. #71185
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Make trivial Params Collections scenarios working end to end #71136
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Generate protected constructors in abstract types #71205
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add back request telemetry in CLaSP queue #71157
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate from prebuilt baseline #71175
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure the editorconfig for code-style analysis ("IDExxxx") rules is included #71173
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Collection expressions: align ConversionsBase.GetCollectionExpressionTypeKind() with spec #70975
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Split integration test build from test run #71166
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expression spread optimization #71195
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cache ROS constructed from arrays of constants (remaining types) #69820
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Start local function analysis with captured variables marked "not null" #71148
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Create a Razor language server cohosted in Roslyn #70819
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run Spanish tests on CoreClr #67748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and… #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Use CPS for tests where saving documents needs to be reliable #70983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update status/details on implicit indexers in object initializers #71164
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Loosen compiler restriction which was not required by the spec #71110
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Remove navigation helpers based on line+offset #71184
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Gladstone #71135
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: tests for spreads of dynamic and non-generic IEnumerable collections #71158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Add GetDeclaredSymbol overload for LocalFunctionStatementSyntax #71169
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce size of source constructor symbol #71178
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimize nullable value type constant comparison codegen #68069
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
